nodes.name: Getting Comfortable in the Water
nodes.description: First sessions in the whitewater, getting used to the board.

nodes.name: Whitewater Paddling
nodes.description: Practice paddling and balance in the whitewater.

nodes.name: Pop-Up in Whitewater
nodes.description: Stand up in the whitewater with control.

nodes.name: Angle Takeoffs
nodes.description: Start taking off at a slight angle toward the shoulder.

nodes.name: Trimming Down the Line
nodes.description: Ride along the face of the wave, not just straight.
